arguments.name: extensionPurpose
arguments.value: Adds Belgian regulatory, risk, and channel fields to the standard CDM Bank entity

definitions.description: Extended Bank entity with organization-specific fields for Belgian banking operations. Inherits all attributes from the standard CDM Bank entity and adds risk classification, SWIFT codes, regulatory license, onboarding channel, and PSD2 compliance tracking.

hasAttributes.name: riskRating
hasAttributes.description: Internal institutional risk rating (1=Very Low, 2=Low, 3=Medium, 4=High, 5=Very High)

hasAttributes.name: regulatoryLicenseNumber
hasAttributes.description: National Bank of Belgium (NBB) regulatory license number

hasAttributes.name: onboardingChannel
hasAttributes.description: Channel through which the bank was onboarded (Digital, Branch, Partnership, Acquisition)

hasAttributes.name: isPSD2Compliant
hasAttributes.description: Whether the bank is compliant with PSD2 (Payment Services Directive 2) regulations
